Summary: Large UFO and 4 smaller UFos near Kerrick, OK 28/1
trends: There have been no other sightings in Kerrick
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details (you can type over these instructions.)please limit your narrative to 2000 words (equivalent to 6 typed pages). 1. a 62 year old truck driver had just left boise, ok and was headed south easton us hwy 287. he was near the town of kerrick, on the ok\tx line.2. he first noticed the objects out of the left corner of his windshield.3. since the objects were in the clouds and moving with the clouds, he thoughtthey were just clouds.4. when he first saw them, he slowed down from about 60 mph to around 45 mph totry to get a better look.5. the witness states he observed 4 dark, blue\gray objects (dark spots in theclouds or oval shapeed)moving in a straight line and just in front of theobjects, was a larger object the same color. all 5 objects stopped and hovered. the large object appeared below the clouds, with the 4 objects now spacedaround it, but they were still in the clouds. the large ufo shot out a whitebeam at each object, one at a time, and the smaller ufos were drawn into thelarger one. 5. the ufo went straight up in the clouds and i lost sight of it.
